name: 35th World Congress on Cardiology & Heart Diseases
content: On March 22â€“23, 2023, Conference Series LLC Ltd cordially invites all attendees and sponsors from around the world to the "35th World Congress on Cardiology & Heart Diseases." Conference Series LLC Ltd organizes 1000+ conferences per year across the United States, Europe, and Asia, with the support of 1000 more scientific societies, and publishes 900+ open access journals with over 60000 eminent personalities and renowned scientists on the editorial board. "Reconnoitering Challenges Concerning Prediction & Prevention of Heart Diseases" is the conference's main topic and theme. The goal of CARDIOLOGY CONGRESS 2023 is to bring together renowned cardiologists, online visitors from the field of cardiovascular research and clinical cardiology, including researchers, academicians, and business professionals, as well as students and business delegates, under one roof to share knowledge and advance science and shape future research. Our conference has a well-balanced speaker lineup that covers both broad and specific topics of interest. Our goal is to provide an opportunity for cardiac physicians, specialists, nurses, technologists, and anyone else professionally involved in Cardiovascular Disease to learn about the disease's complexity, discuss interventional procedures, examine new and advanced cardiac practices and their efficiency and efficacy in the treatment of various cases, and understand local realities and practical constraints in improving patient-care. The theme of the CARDIOLOGY CONGRESS 2023 will be "One Step Forward Toward Advancements in Cardiovascular Research and Heart Diseases."
